sentences.english: At this point, we have created standard interfaces and business objects.
sentences.chinese: 此時，我們已經創建了標準的接口和業務對象。

sentences.english: It was then I noticed tears glistening on my mother's cheeks.
sentences.chinese: 恰在此時，我看到媽媽的面頰上閃着晶瑩的淚光。

sentences.english: And the son of the precious people believe city jun also to die at this time.
sentences.chinese: 而金貴人之子信城君也於此時病死。

sentences.english: At this moment, an idea came into Tucheng ' s mind, which was to make artificial cultivated land.
sentences.chinese: 此時的土成有一個心願，他萌生了人造耕地的想法。

sentences.english: Ask how many active Scrum teams they have at the moment.
sentences.chinese: 因此要詢問他們此時有多少活躍的Scrum團隊。

sentences.english: The service should stop its execution because writing to the log fails.
sentences.chinese: 服務將停止執行，因爲此時日誌文件寫入失敗。

sentences.english: Space project motion is right now apropos 20 hours.
sentences.chinese: 此時距離項目動議恰好20個小時。

sentences.english: At this time, avoid to defeat psychological, not tired is wise.
sentences.chinese: 此時，切忌不甘失敗的心理，不戀戰是明智之舉。

sentences.english: And here I am ranting against somebody that doesn't have a chance to respond.
sentences.chinese: 並且在這裏我還要痛斥那些此時無法作出迴應的人。

sentences.english: At that point you already know they are valid.
sentences.chinese: 此時，您已經知道它們是有效的。

sentences.english: A list of the bus destinations that are currently defined displays.
sentences.chinese: 此時將顯示當前定義的總線目的地的列表。

sentences.english: We deeply appreciate Russia's expression of solidarity with India at this moment.
sentences.chinese: 我們非常感謝俄羅斯此時此刻對印度表達的團結精神。

sentences.english: This time I, it was the winter the withering grass, in a world of ice and snow in blur.
sentences.chinese: 此時的我，正是冬日枯萎的小草，在冰天雪地裏迷離。

sentences.english: Shunde, a small city in Guangdong, was buried in debt.
sentences.chinese: 而位於廣東省的順德市，此時也是負債累累。

sentences.english: I cherished the memories I had, and the friends I had made, but this was all before the times of MSN and AOL chat programs.
sentences.chinese: 我珍惜這段回憶，和此時所交的朋友。

definition: but/yet/however/while/to go back/to decline/to retreat/nevertheless/even though
a period of time/a while/for a short while/temporary/momentary/at the same time
